highlighted_projects.description: Created a proof-of-concept EMR system for Otekha Health. This project was built using React.js, Java RESTful server, Docker, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, and HAPI-FHIR API.
highlighted_projects.name: Electronic Medical Records System

jarvis_projects.description: Implemented a Linux cluster monitoring agent to manage and insert resource usage information into a PostgreSQL database. The host usage information was collected through bash commands and automated using crontab.
jarvis_projects.name: Cluster Monitor
